subject: [RFC v2 16/21] mm: thp: add THP_SPLIT_PMD_FAILED counter

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: Identified a need for CONFIG_TRANSPARENT_HUGEPAGE guard and additional diff in a future series. Requested author to address these concerns.

2026-02-26.patch_summary: THP_SPLIT_PMD_FAILED counter patch requires CONFIG_TRANSPARENT_HUGEPAGE guard and additional diff in a future series.
